variants.Description in input context: The A30P mutation is described as defective in binding to phospholipid vesicles.
The A53T substitution is described as showing normal membrane-binding activity.

Material used.Description: The experiment involved measuring the binding of a-Syn to lipid vesicles.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutant showed reduced ability to bind lipid vesicles compared to wild-type.
The A53T mutant exhibited normal binding to lipid vesicles.

Biological replicates.Description: Number of biological replicates not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Number of technical replicates not specified.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Normal binding activity as per wild-type levels.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Reduced binding activity compared to wild-type.

Material used.Description: The experiment involved analyzing the secondary structure of a-Syn mutants.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutant exhibited changes in secondary structure compared to wild-type.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: No significant change in secondary structure.
Readout description.Result Description: The A53T mutant showed minimal changes in secondary structure compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Number of biological replicates not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Number of technical replicates not specified.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Secondary structure similar to wild-type a-Syn.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant deviation from wild-type secondary structure.

Material used.Description: The experiment involved analyzing the structural changes in a-Syn mutants using X-ray diffraction.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutant exhibited structural changes compared to wild-type.
The A53T mutant showed minimal structural changes compared to wild-type.

Biological replicates.Description: Number of biological replicates not specified.

Technical replicates.Description: Number of technical replicates not specified.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Structural integrity similar to wild-type a-Syn.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Significant deviation from wild-type structural integrity.
